<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-instrorderfile-cpp-/instrorderfile/#a32adc549fbc7c20005aabb9406435ff4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-instrorderfile-cpp-/instrorderfile/#a32adc549fbc7c20005aabb9406435ff4">generateCodeSequence</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FuncId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a70671d730e965bffded28038403cf0cf">ClOrderFileWriteMapping</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::lock&#95;guard&lt;std::mutex&gt; LogLock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-instrorderfile-cpp-/#a172d9b41fec544c724b94225d6ee5583">MappingMutex</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::error&#95;code EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">llvm::raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> OS(<a href="#a70671d730e965bffded28038403cf0cf">ClOrderFileWriteMapping</a>, EC,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a662978c0cdf81de0d448032f142a3695ac999fafdcc991e61bbc2df56a4310083">llvm::sys::fs::OF&#95;Append</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Failed to open &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) + <a href="#a70671d730e965bffded28038403cf0cf">ClOrderFileWriteMapping</a> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to save mapping file for order file instrumentation\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::stringstream stream;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">        stream &lt;&lt; std::hex &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a8e89e6935aaf48cde9d60fd12a3dae0f">MD5Hash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::string singleLine = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MD5 &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + stream.str() + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 std::string(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName()) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        OS &lt;&lt; singleLine;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigEntry = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getEntryBlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = M.getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23f9ec4bb2576ca8738f3edc9c4f5cdf">Int32Ty</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a30dd396c5b40cd86c1591872e574ccdf">Type::getInt32Ty</a>(Ctx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a> &#42;Int8Ty = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7ba5de75f50bb4a4ba920698edf39b28">Type::getInt8Ty</a>(Ctx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a new entry block for instrumentation. We will check the bitmap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in this basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewEntry =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(M.getContext(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;order&#95;file&#95;entry&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, OrigEntry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> entryB(NewEntry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a basic block for updating the circular buffer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;UpdateOrderFileBB =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(M.getContext(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;order&#95;file&#95;set&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, OrigEntry);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> updateB(UpdateOrderFileBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the bitmap, if it is already 1, do nothing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, set the bit, grab the index, update the buffer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;IdxFlags&#91;&#93; = &#123;ConstantInt::get(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23f9ec4bb2576ca8738f3edc9c4f5cdf">Int32Ty</a>, 0),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         ConstantInt::get(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23f9ec4bb2576ca8738f3edc9c4f5cdf">Int32Ty</a>, FuncId)&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;MapAddr = entryB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73e0482b96d9d0cdfcc90c0a34f5b0db">CreateGEP</a>(MapTy, BitMap, IdxFlags, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;loadBitMap = entryB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b01712e5f196d6d3d021ef23aad50e4">CreateLoad</a>(Int8Ty, MapAddr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    entryB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aabfc20af4dcf7d94262824dcac2e7bed">CreateStore</a>(ConstantInt::get(Int8Ty, 1), MapAddr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;IsNotExecuted =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">        entryB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8c75539a39f167f352b37ccdd788a7e4">CreateICmpEQ</a>(loadBitMap, ConstantInt::get(Int8Ty, 0));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill up UpdateOrderFileBB: grab the index, update the buffer!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;IdxVal = updateB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab2a2c89b21cf14b2c729a898006cb438">CreateAtomicRMW</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a0794c42b44989f9d9f1454d79ca0dd88">AtomicRMWInst::Add</a>, BufferIdx, ConstantInt::get(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23f9ec4bb2576ca8738f3edc9c4f5cdf">Int32Ty</a>, 1),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7ae3b0fa849dbd758b450f98fcfde936a2">AtomicOrdering::SequentiallyConsistent</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to wrap around the index to fit it inside the buffer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WrappedIdx = updateB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa4f2cec52a8e17a4c72319334fbef771">CreateAnd</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BufferAddr =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FuncId = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> : M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
